website_summaries.verdict: Great price for a tough blocking dummy that will stand up to repeated use at practice.
pros: Uses 2 reinforced handles on the back to ensure the partner can hold the pad securely
Uses a high density foam that will hold its shape nicely, even after repeated contact
Good size at about 18 inches by 26 inches
Works equally well for basketball layup drills and football blocking drills
cons: Corners are hard, which negates the padding in that area

website_summaries.verdict: Effective for football practice as well as other contact sports, enhancing high-impact training.
pros: Made with heavy-duty PVC and high-density foam
Quality equipment for teaching young athletes how to handle contact
cons: The corners can be hard upon contact

customer_reviews.title: The corners are too hard and painful on contact which frequently touch a players face as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for basketball. The corners are too hard and painful on contact which frequently touch a players face as they lower the shoulder to initiate contact. The seems and zipper could have been designed better to avoid this. I am placing a winter coat over mine for tonight's practice to see if that helps. This product is built tough and would be fine for sports with a helmet that protects the face. Perfect for football!
customer_reviews.author: thomas j. boutaugh

customer_reviews.title: Super Basketball workout pad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent workout pad for my 13 year old son. This is a firm foam pad. Great for challenging a driving layup without having to make body to body contact and risk injury while training. Handles are durable and i expect it to last years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C Werneke

customer_reviews.title: Cancer causing???
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the size, shape, and apparent durability... BUT I'm a little concerned about the sticker that says 'chemicals in this product are considered cancer-causing in the sate of California'... What's that all about?!?
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Should make a great blocking, etc pad for football training. Only time will tell for durability, but construction appears to be terrific. Casing material is thick and durable. Inner pad is solid, with minimal compression, just as you want. Handles are well stitched. Overall, very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: guinness

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I bought this 3 years ago. Use it for every sport my son plays damn near. Basketball,football,wrestling,boxing,he even kicks it when i'm working with me. It holds up,worth every penny. Straps still tight also. Im known as the neighborhood coach,so multiple kids have hit this bag over the years. Never an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Up&@em

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball
customer_reviews.text: Great for playing D on my 5th grade basketball player. He drives to the hole either left or right and I soft chuck him when he is shooting layup. He was frusterated right away as tough to make with that chuck but after 4 or 5 practice sessions he really got good at using the glass on layups. Haven’t seen him miss a layup in 3 on 3 league yet and he has a lot of confidence driving the hole. Full team 5 on 5 starts soon and I would bet results will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Nate m.

customer_reviews.title: Good Training Tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my young son teaching him the good old fashioned violence of football..lol...I know most frown upon it but it is super fun...good product...does the trick...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Yaniero

customer_reviews.title: Good pad, functional handles.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, but light enough in weight to be able to move it around quickly. Straps fit nicely on the arm and allow you to firmly control the pad. Appropriate amount of cushion to protect player and coach, but still firm enough for the player to get knocked around a bit. We use it for basketball drills, but would be helpful in most contact sports where you want to teach players how to make or take contact as they perform.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholi

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: It has taken a beating through one season and still looks new. Solid product with great padding and lightweight. A must have to do the extra training at home to help your younger athletes excel.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Having a blast coaching with this pad.
customer_reviews.text: The pad is great for helping coaching basketball. Now my girls feel comfortable driving hard to the basket, taking opponents fouls & still consentrate on making the layups. We have more 3 point plays the 'old fashion way'. excellent for training post to get use to contact in the painted are. awesome durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues using these with our 5 & 6 yr olds
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Asia-Su'a

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: perfect for augmenting by boys' football training in their first year of tackle
customer_reviews.author: JH Fortenberry

customer_reviews.title: Block Me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a basketball coach...we just started using this product and it is very sturdy and is holding up thus far. However, the handles will give you burn around the hands as you take consistent contact.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: We used this pad for basketball practice for 11-12 year olds to simulate contact going in for a layup. Seems to be sturdy. The only reason I gave 4 stars was because I felt it was a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Taeiou

customer_reviews.title: Great for the back yard drills
customer_reviews.text: Great for working in the back yard with our middle school son.
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love how well its put together, use it for many things..

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. This is a must have if your kids play football. You are able to give them extra work on proper tackling mechanics add well as a host of other techniques dealing with many other sports. Not good for kicking.... Trust me. Found out the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Goarilla Blocking Pad
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability of this product, used it for practice and it helped a lot. This is also great for the person bumping the kids, it’s durable and sturdy enough that it protected them. Love this product. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.author: SarahM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, works just like i had hoped. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Nice and tough
customer_reviews.text: Nice and tough! Stands up to medium hits without pads - haven't tested it with pads yet. Lightweight enough and the handle straps seems sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Iv been using this for a kick pad and I train with very hard kicking people and you can’t feel the pain. You can definitely feel the pressure of the kick but very very awesome pad for kicking I would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Great & Fun Product
customer_reviews.text: So far product is what I expected and needed. One thing that I wasn’t expecting is how the kids love it. They love the challenge and now ask for me to use the Gorilla Pad during drills.

customer_reviews.text: Use this in the back yard to help my son prepare for football holds up great!

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocking Dummy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is high quality without question. Very solid, very thick, and all quality products. For the price you just cannot go wrong.

customer_reviews.text: Used them first day I received them and only problem is your fingers rubbing on the leather will hurt but that's it.

customer_reviews.title: Goalrilla Pad
customer_reviews.text: The pad is just the right stiffness and thickness to make this work for all practice drills. The vinyl cover and the stitching is of high quality to withstand the test.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Points in the Paint
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my 9 year old son. I feared he would not like it, but as it turns out he LOVES it. It is super soft and does not hurt at all and allows me to push him around a bit as he drives to the hole and rebounds. At a young age, if you can learn to get used to contact and not let it bother/impact your game, the game becomes a lot easier. It's a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: wlg2010

customer_reviews.title: sturdy great pick up
customer_reviews.text: I train kids for basketball . Durable ,sturdy great pick up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for toughening up my 7 and 8 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for toughening up my 7 and 8 year old basketball team. Plan to use during upcoming football season as well

customer_reviews.title: Blocking pad for basketball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson to practice with buddies for basketball. He says that he is pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bainbridge gal

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've purchased these before. These are not thin cheap pads. The pads are large; providing cover from shoulder to knee; thick 5-6"; high quality construction. Stitching is very strong. I use for 5th / 6th grade football but could be used for high school as well. A design modification suggestion: rather than two strap handles on backside that you have to hold with two hands; I'd prefer a forearm option; one strap around forearm and grasping the second strap with hand.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for

I really think the company should tell you ! Might just file a complaint with the BBB. Gave it five star so you would read !! But over all product is well made and easy to hold . My son is gonna love this :)

product_meta.title: Goalrilla Football Blocking Dummy with Heavy-Duty Handles, Durable for Football, Basketball, MMA & Sports Training
product_meta.description: The perfect training tool for all athletes at any level, the Goalrilla Blocking Dummy is built with incredible strength and durability to withstand heavy abuse and absorb high impact strikes. Made with heavy-duty tear proof PVC and high-density foam, this blocking dummy with stand up to whatever you can throw at it. This is a perfect dummy for simulated contact drills for any sport, including football, basketball, mixed martial arts, and more, and at any age and skill level including youth sports, middle school, high school, and collegiate. With reinforced straps and 2 heavy-duty handles, the Goalrilla Blocking Dummy allows you to stay in control during the most intense work-outs and offers a safer alternative to contact drills. This blocking dummy measures 26.4" high, 18.5" wide, 7.3" thick, and weighs 3.1 lbs. Since 1927, Escalade Sports has taken pride in manufacturing quality products. With a fully-staffed customer service team, we are committed to providing courteous care and a 100% guarantee you will be satisfied with your purchase.
feature_bullets: SIMULATE SAFER BLOCKING DRILLS – Heavy-Duty Blocking Dummy for Safer Simulated Contact Drills Measuring 26.4" High, 18.5" Wide, and 7.3" Thick
VERSATILE CONTACT DUMMY – Perfect for All Skill and Age Levels to Practice Football, Basketball, Mixed Martial Arts, and Many Other Sports
REINFORCED HANDLES – Two Reinforced Heavy-Duty Handles for Superior Control During Intense Workouts
THICK, DENSE INNER AND OUTER MATERIAL – 50.6 lbs/Cubic Meter High Density Foam And 500 Grams/Cubic Meter PVC

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Since 1927, Escalade Sports has taken pride in manufacturing quality products. With a fully-staffed customer service team, we are committed to providing courteous care and a 100% guarantee you will be satisfied with your purchase

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
